text: (itanal tankalukku) or apattum erpatatu enru avarkal ennik kontanar. Atalal, avarkal (unmaiyaik kana mutiyata) kurutarkalakavum, (ataik ketka mutiyata) cevitarkalakavum akivittanar. Itan pinnarum, allah avarkalai mannittan. Eninum, avarkalil perumpanmaiyinar pirakum kurutarkalakavum, cevitarkalakavume irukkinranar. Anal, allah avarkal ceypavarrai urru nokkupavan avan
